Primary Contact: Debbie Schneider, Office Manager, Agur Lake Camp Society; Phone: 1.250.809.7130; Email: info@agurlakecamp.ca
Service Details: Provides a barrier-free wilderness camp and recreational facility near Summerland for children and adults with special needs along with their families and caregivers
Hours: Office open: Summer Mon-Fri, 10am - 2pm, Winter Tues/Wed/Thurs 10am - 2pm
Eligibility: Families, individuals, organizations, and agencies that care for or provide services for those with special needs
How to Apply: Please visit our website to check out the availability calendar and make reservations or call or email the office with any questions.
Cost: CABIN 1 - $100 per night - up to a maximum of six people per night/per cabin CABIN 2 - $100 per night/per cabin - up to a maximum of six people per night/per cabin CABIN 3 - $100 per night/per cabin - up to a maximum of six people per night/per cabin MORE THAN 1 CABIN please contact office to reserve more than 1 cabin DRY RV CAMPSITE @ $25 per night/per unit
Address & Map: 9913 Main StSummerland, BC     V0H 1Z0View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Both the camp and office are fully accessible
